name: Keep IT Fed
description:
What is this thing in the gutter? OH, a nice clown! He looks hungry, I gonna find something for him to eat…

In this game, you want to keep your friend Pennywise alive. For that, only one way: find him people to eat. You move your bike using arrows. When you want to go back to It, just press spacebar. Be carefull of the differents traps, they allow the children you caught to escape.
